title: Catholicism: A Journey to the Heart of the Faith (Audiobook)
description:
Fr. Robert Barron - Catholicism: A Journey to the Heart of the Faith (Unabridged Audiobook)

EPUB/MOBI: https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/11850244/

Read by the author, Fr. Robert Barron

The audio version of Catholicism: A Journey to the Heart of the Faith complements the DVD series and study program. The book is based on the scripts for the series, but delves more deeply into the content.

This audio version of the original title is available for listening in your car or on the go, approximately 9 hours of content on 7 disks.

In Catholicism: A Journey to the Heart of the Faith, Father Barron seeks to capture the body, heart and mind of the Catholic faith. Starting from the essential foundation of Jesus ChristÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s incarnation, life, and teaching, Father Barron moves through the defining elements of Catholicism Ã¢â‚¬â€œ from sacraments, worship, and prayer, to Mary, the Apostles, and Saints, to grace, salvation, heaven, and hell Ã¢â‚¬â€œ using his distinct and dynamic grasp of art, literature, architecture, personal stories, Scripture, theology, philosophy, and history to present the Church to the world.

Paired with his documentary film series of the same title, Catholicism is an intimate journey, capturing Ã¢â‚¬Å“The Catholic ThingÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ in all its depth and beauty. Eclectic, unique, and inspiring, Father Barron brings the faith to life for a new generation, in a style that is both faithful to timeless truths, while simultaneously speaking in the language of contemporary life.

About the book, Fr. Barron says, Ã¢â‚¬Å“What I propose to do in this book is to take you on a guided exploration of the Catholic world, but not in the manner of a docent, for I am not interested in showing you the artifacts of Catholicism as though they were dusty objets dÃ¢â‚¬â„¢art in a museum of culture. I want to function rather as a mystagogue, conducting you ever deeper into the mystery of the incarnation in the hopes that you might be transformed by its power.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½
